item.title: Jaguar Joins Bud Light in the Hall of Ad Infamy
item.description: Woke advertising claims another major brand.

item.title: Trump’s Tariff Tangle
item.description: The basic inconsistency in his views will make it difficult to enact any kind of coherent trade policy.

item.title: Trump Can’t Fight Big Labor Alone. States Must Also Help
item.description: State legislators should protect public sector workers and mitigate the power and influence of public sector unions in their own backyard.

item.title: Where Trump Won: The Rust Belt
item.description: At the county level, Donald Trump’s victory doesn’t look like a rebellion against the cities and suburbs.

item.title: Mass Deportation Is an Appropriate Response to Mass Illegal Immigration
item.description: And unlike Trump’s enemies, the public doesn’t fear enforcement of laws that have been systematically ignored for much too long.
